app.name: GCBooterTLH
app.long_description:
Just a version of emu_kidid's excellent GCBooter program that works correctly on PAL Wiis in 60hz mode.
As emu_kidid's original description says: "Allows users to boot Gamecube games (original discs only kthx) on their Nintendo Wii via the homebrew channel. It is also region free."
